23 #include "dynamic.hpp"

25 namespace eternity {
26  /*static*/ Ifactory *Ifactory::m_pHead = 0;
27 
28  std::string get_conventional_name(std::string compiler_name) {
29  std::string conventional_name;
30  Ifactory *pCurrent = Ifactory::m_pHead;
31 
32  for (; pCurrent; pCurrent = pCurrent->m_pNext) {
33  conventional_name = pCurrent->get_conventional_name(compiler_name);
34  if (!conventional_name.empty()) break;
35  }
36 
37  return conventional_name;
38  }
